channel.title: 718/728 Donator crowns
channel.description:
Hey, i upgraded to the 728 cache.
Everything is good, except for the donator/extreme donator crowns.
In the 723 cache they were there, now they are not.
So i downloaded the sprites editor from Steven from RS
And i opened my 728 cache and went to the image 1455 (friend told me)
And i saw 7 models, 2 of them were jagex crown + mod crown.
So i clicked on ''add new sprite''
and added a new sprite, but the spirte (donator crown) was 2 times bigger then the jagex crown, so maybe thats the problem?
I clicked on, pack to cache and he packed.
And i compiled my server and runned it, but still no crowns.
Anyone has a idea?
And if you know where to get a donator crown, extreme donator crown, please let me now.

item.title: 718/728 Donator crowns
item.dc:creator: @The_Legendary_Leeche The Legendary Leecher
item.description:
@The_Legendary_Leeche wrote:

Hey, i upgraded to the 728 cache.

Everything is good, except for the donator/extreme donator crowns.

In the 723 cache they were there, now they are not.

So i downloaded the sprites editor from Steven from RS

And i opened my 728 cache and went to the image 1455 (friend told me)

And i saw 7 models, 2 of them were jagex crown + mod crown.

So i clicked on ‘‘add new sprite’’

and added a new sprite, but the spirte (donator crown) was 2 times bigger then the jagex crown, so maybe thats the problem?

I clicked on, pack to cache and he packed.

And i compiled my server and runned it, but still no crowns.

Anyone has a idea?

And if you know where to get a donator crown, extreme donator crown, please let me now.
